home.name: Kerly Sarrias
home.greeting: Hi! I am Kerly Vanessa Sarrias
home.description: Full Stack Web Developer with skills in multiple technologies and always in search of new challenges and opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills.

about.title: About Me
about.head1: I am a React Frontend developer or
about.description: I have a solid knowledge of a wide range of key technologies. My experience includes front-end development with React, HTML, CSS and tools like Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, as well as back-end development with Node.js, databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB, using frameworks and libraries like Sequelize and Express.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: I participated in the creation of landing pages and user interfaces using React and Next.js. I carried out the integration with the Mercado Pago API to accept card payments and the creation of a blog using WordPress.

jobs.title: Agroindustrial engineering
jobs.description: Developed and optimized RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Implemented secure authentication mechanisms and database integration with PostgreSQL.

education.description: I am acquiring a solid foundation in programming and software development, learning to create scalable and secure applications. I am also developing skills in systems analysis, quality testing, and project management, with a focus on teamwork and innovation.

During the Talento Tech Bootcamp, I acquired advanced skills in full-stack web development, including building applications with React, microservices architecture, advanced authentication, and database optimization. In addition, I learned CI/CD techniques with Docker and Kubernetes, strengthening my ability to solve complex problems and adapt to dynamic development environments.

During the bootcamp I acquired skills in front-end and back-end. I developed skills in creating and maintaining web applications, applying responsive design principles and good coding practices. Additionally, I strengthened my ability to work in a team, solve complex technical problems, and adapt to development environments.

During my engineering career, I have developed strong skills in analysis and problem solving. I gained experience in research, experimentation and project management, standing out for my ability to communicate effectively and work as a team. My experience includes a strong ethical commitment, adaptability and focus on innovation.

projects.title: Huila Travel
projects.description: Web application that allows the reservation of tourist sites in the department of Huila. Users can explore and book tourist plans, manage their profiles and create tourist sites.

projects.title: Social Net
projects.description: Web application that allows interaction between users. It includes functionalities such as registration, login, profile creation and management, publication, and user tracking.
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: Web app that allows you to search, filter, and view Pokémon cards by species name and detailed information.

projects.title: Rick and Morty App
projects.description: A web app that displays characters and episodes from the Rick and Morty TV series
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A web app that displays current weather and forecast for a given location

projects.title: Fortune Cookie
projects.description: A web app that generates random fortune cookie messages

projects.title: User App
projects.description: A web app that allows users to create, read, update and delete user data
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, MySQL, MongoDB, Sequelize
